So: in your Inbox sits a new email. And only by replying to the email will the *buttonText* appear and allow you to transition to the next page. This is because the *mailCriteria* variable is entered as *reply*, and the string for the *affectedMail* variable is `chapter2/T2.2.5/mail1.json`

So please reply now! (And note that the *showInNotebook* variable of the **mail** file is set to *true*, meaning that any reply you compose will be saved to your Notebook---as long as you've also remembered to add a **notebookEntry** file to this page.)

Finally, to the final two variables in the **pageTransition** criteria...
